member.name: T:PGStatLibrary.PGStat
member.summary:
The main PGStat class.
Contains all methods for controlling the device.

member.name: F:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.dcgetNdata
member.summary: The number of data coming from dcget command family.

member.name: F:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.SettingsIsIVReceiverUnsigned
member.summary: Device settings. Do not change it.

member.summary: The inputs of the CV method.

member.name: F:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.IV_Input
member.summary: The inputs of the IV method.

member.name: F:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.Chrono_Input
member.summary: The inputs of the Chrono method.

member.name: P:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.Lastdummy
member.summary: The last state of the dummy.

member.name: P:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.Lastsample
member.summary: The last state of the sample.

member.name: P:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.LastOCPState
member.summary: The last value of Open Circuit Potential state. Respectively, false and true are Inactive and Active.

member.name: P:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.LastRelRefState
member.summary:
The last value of RelRef state. Respectively, false and true are Absolute and Relative modes.
If it is true, the potential of the working electrode is relative to the reference electrode.

member.name: P:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.LastOCP
member.summary: The Open Circuit Potential. It can be voltage or current with respect to the PGMode. The unit for set voltage/current is Volt/Ampere.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_StartConnecting
member.summary: Process a PG_EVT_StartConnecting event, when PGStat started to search for a connected device.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_Connected
member.summary: Process a PG_EVT_Connected event, when PGStat connected to the device.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_Ping
member.summary: Process a PG_EVT_Ping event, when PGStat is pinging.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_Disconnected
member.summary: Process a PG_EVT_Disconnected event, when PGStat is disconnected from the device.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_Unpluged
member.summary: Process a PG_EVT_Unpluged event, when PGStat is disconnected accidentally.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_OffsetRemovalStarted
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Offset Removal Started event.
It will be fired once Potentiostat or Galvanostat offset removal started.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_OffsetRemovalFinished
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Offset Removal Finished event.
It will be fired once Potentiostat or Galvanostat offset removal finished.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_AProcessStarted
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Async Process Started event.
It will be fired once an async process started.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_AProcessFinished
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Async Process Finished event.
It will be fired once an async process finished.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_ACommandDataReceived
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Data Received event of ACommand process.
ACommand is the asynchronous mode of the method Command.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_AdcgetDataReceived
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Data Received event of Adcget process.
Adcget is the asynchronous mode of the method dcget.
Note that the raw data of event, according to the values of the setdcselect and idcselect functions, will be translated to observable values. One can convert the data using ConvertToObservable.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_AdcgetTotalDataReceived
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Total Data Received event of AdcgetTotal process.
AdcgetTotal is the asynchronous mode of the method dcget.
Note that the raw data of event, according to the values of the setdcselect and idcselect functions, will be translated to observable values. One can convert the data using ConvertToObservable.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_AivsetDataReceived
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Data Received event of Aivset process.
Aivset is the asynchronous mode of the method ivset.
Note that the raw data of event, according to the values of the setdcselect and idcselect functions, will be translated to observable values. One can convert the data using ConvertToObservable.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_ACVDataReceived
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Data Received event of ACV process.
ACV is the asynchronous mode of the method CV.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_AIVDataReceived
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Data Received event of AIV process.
AIV is the asynchronous mode of the method IV.

member.name: E:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.PG_EVT_AChronoDataReceived
member.summary:
Represents the method that will handle the Data Received event of AChrono process.
AChrono is the asynchronous mode of the method Chrono.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.#ctor
member.summary:
The constructor for the PGStat class.
The object contains all methods for controlling the device.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.SetNotificationVerbosity(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This method determines the verbosity of notifications.
0: notification off.
1: Release mode of final software for user.
2: Debug mode for developer of the software.
3: Debug mode for developer of the dll.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.EnableAutoReconnect
member.summary: This function determines that the PGStat wills try to reconnect in case of accidentally disconnection.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.DisableAutoReconnect
member.summary: This function determines that the PGStat avoids automatical reconnection in the case of accidentally disconnection.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.IsConnected
member.summary: Returns true if PGStat is connected to the device.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.IsPingEnabled
member.summary: Returns true if PGStat is pinging data to the software.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.ClearBuffer
member.summary: Try to discard both input and output buffers of the connected port.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.EnablePing
member.summary: It turns on the pinging process.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.DisablePing
member.summary: It turns off the pinging process.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.Command(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method sends the command to device and returns the reply synchronously.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.ACommand(System.String)
member.summary:
This method sends the command to device in asynchronous mode.
The reply will be accessible from the ACommandEventArgs of the callback PG_EVT_ACommandDataReceived.
If the command is sent successfully, True is returned.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.vfilter(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This function changes the voltage filter.
0:
1:
2:

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.idcfilter(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This function changes the DC current filter.
0:
1:
2:

member.summary:
This function changes the DC current range.
0:
1:
2:
3:

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.setselect(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This function changes the voltage range.
0:
1:
2:
3:

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.idcmlp(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This function changes the DC current multiplier.
0:
1:
2:
3:

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.vdcmlp(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This function changes the DC voltage multiplier.
0:
1:
2:
3:

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.zeroset(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This function sets the zero level of DC voltage.
The input value should be set between 0 and 4096.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.acset(System.Int32)
member.summary: This function sets the AC voltage.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.aczero(System.Int32)
member.summary: This function sets the zero level of the AC current.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.vaczero(System.Int32)
member.summary: This function sets the zero level of the AC voltage.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.dummy(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This method connect or disconnect the dummy probe;
The dummy is a 1KOhm resistor.
0: Disconnect
1: Connect

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.sample(System.Int32)
M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.RelRefState(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Sets the RelRef state. Respectively, false and true are Absolute and Relative modes.
If it is true, the potential of the working electrode is relative to the reference electrode.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.OCP(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the Open Circuit Potential state. Respectively, false and true are Inactive and Active.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.OCP(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the Open Circuit Potential. It can be voltage or current with respect to the PGMode. The unit for set voltage/current is Volt/Ampere.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.EqTime(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the equilibrium time in (ms). It is the waiting time just after the pretreatment voltage/current is set.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.Pretreatment(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the pretreatment. It can be voltage or current with respect to the set PGMode.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.IdealVoltage(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the ideal value for voltage/current in Volt/Ampere with respect to the set PGMode.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.ToRawData(System.Double)
member.summary: Convert an observable value to raw data.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.dcget
member.summary:
Returns the raw data of Voltage and Current.
Note, the raw data for both input and output values, according to the values of the setdcselect and idcselect functions, will be translated to observable values. One can convert the data using ConvertToObservable.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.Adcget
member.summary:
This method start the command dcget in asynchronous mode.
The reply will be accessible from the AdcgetEventArgs of the callback PG_EVT_AdcgetDataReceived.
The data will be passed one by one including its index.
This method is suitable in the case of real time plotting. Note, the plotter should be fast enough.
If the command is sent successfully, True is returned.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.AdcgetTotal
member.summary:
This method start the command dcget in asynchronous mode.
The reply will be accessible from the AdcgetTotalEventArgs of the callback PG_EVT_AdcgetTotalDataReceived.
The whole data will be collected in memory and the total array will be passed to AdcgetTotalEventArgs.
If the command is sent successfully, True is returned.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.ivset(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This method set the desire voltage/current in potentiostat/galvanostat mode and returns the real voltage and real current.
The input is a raw data not real voltage/current. The raw data is between 0 and 4095. The middle point is 2047.
Note, the raw data for both input and output values, according to the values of the setdcselect and idcselect functions, will be translated to observable values. One can convert the data using ConvertToObservable.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.Aivset(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This method start the command ivset in asynchronous mode.
The reply will be accessible from the AivsetEventArgs of the callback PG_EVT_AivsetDataReceived.
The raw values of voltage and current will be collected in an array and passed to AivsetEventArgs.
If the command is sent successfully, True is returned.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.ACV
member.summary:
This method start the command CV in asynchronous mode.
The reply will be accessible from the ACVEventArgs of the callback PG_EVT_ACVDataReceived.
It returns true when the command is sent to device successfully.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.AIV
member.summary:
This method start the command IV in asynchronous mode.
The reply will be accessible from the AIVEventArgs of the callback PG_EVT_AIVDataReceived.
It returns true when the command is sent to device successfully.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.AChrono
member.summary:
This method start the command Chrono in asynchronous mode.
The reply will be accessible from the AChronoEventArgs of the callback PG_EVT_AChronoDataReceived.
It returns true when the command is sent to device successfully.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.DeviceVer
member.summary: Returns the version of the device firmware.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.version
member.summary: Returns the version of the PGStat library.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.IsBusy
member.summary: Command to check the process status. Returns true if an async process in the device is currently running.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.Disconnect
member.summary: This method disconnects PGStat from the device.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.Connect
member.summary: This method searchs and tries to connect PGStat to the device.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.ResetFactory
member.summary:
Restore device to factory settings.
Please contact with the manufacturer to do this.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.SaveSettings(System.String)
member.summary: Write the settings in a binary file.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.MicroSaveSettings(System.String)
member.summary: Save the settings from a binary file to the Micro Controller.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.LoadSettings(System.String)
member.summary:
Load the settings from a binary file.
Returns the version of the settings written in the file.
Returns 0 if the file was not found.
Returns -1 if the file is an old verson or maybe it was corrupted during save process.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.LoadSettingsFromDevice(System.String)
member.summary:
Load the settings from the device and save to a binary file.
Returns the version of the settings written in the file.
Returns 0 if the file was not found.
Returns -1 if the file is an old verson or maybe it was corrupted during save process.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.OffsetRemoval
member.summary:
Offset removal in Potentiostat mode.
Returns true if done.

member.name: M:PGStatLibrary.PGStat.G_OffsetRemoval
member.summary:
Offset removal in Galvanostat mode.
Returns true if done.
